## Champions Cohorts

The Water Boards Openscapes Champions Program is a mentorship and professional development opportunity for individuals and teams at the Water Boards.

### Current and Upcoming Cohorts

[**2024 Spring Water Boards Cohort**](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/swrcb-openscapes/cohorts/swrcb_2024S.html)**:** From late-March through late-May 2024, the Water Boards will host a Champions Cohort, which will include 6 teams of no more than 6 individuals per team.

::: callout-tip
# Want to apply for our Spring 2024 Cohort?

Check out:

-   [Is my team ready for Openscapes?](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/swrcb-openscapes/about_at_swrcb/team_guidance.html)
-   The Spring 2024 Cohort [timeline](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/swrcb-openscapes/cohorts/swrcb_2024S.html)
-   ***Water Boards teams will be able to apply for this opportunity from Jan 22 - Mar 1, 2024.***
:::

The Water Boards Openscapes Team offered to present about this work and its future in our organization to management, internal roundtables, and work groups, starting in Nov 2023 (see [presentation list](https://github.com/CAWaterBoardDataCenter/swrcb-openscapes/issues/15)). To request a presentation please email [Anna Holder](mailto:anna.holder@waterboards.ca.gov).

[**2024 Fall Water Boards Cohort**](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/swrcb-openscapes/cohorts/swrcb_2024F.html)**:** From mid-August through mid-October 2024, the Water Boards will host a Champions Cohort, which will include 6 teams of no more than 6 individuals per team.

***Water Boards teams will be able to apply for this opportunity from Jan 22 - Mar 1, 2024 & May 1 - Jun 30, 2024.***
